Disabled_Description: Setting to true disables the module
PublicKey_Description: Public key obtained at reCAPTCHA website
PrivateKey_Description: Private key obtained at reCAPTCHA website
LimitCount_Description: Denotes number of unsuccessful login attempts required for CAPTCHA to be displayed, 0 - always displayed
WhitelistIPs_Description: List of IP addresses CAPTCHA is never be displayed for
IncludeInMobile_Description: If true, the module is used in mobile version of the interface
IncludeInDesktop_Description: If true, the module is used in desktop version of the interface
